thread.title: Watch Rich Chigga and His Friends Discuss Lucid Dreaming
thread.title_full: Watch Rich Chigga and His Friends Discuss Lucid Dreaming

author: Jake Boyer
title: Watch Rich Chigga and His Friends Discuss Lucid Dreaming
text:
Rich Chigga has had a pretty prolific winter. After dropping a music video for his single “ Who That Be ” in addition to another new single titled “ Seventeen ,” he is now moving into the realms of philosophy. A new video short from 88Rising sees the viral rapper digging deep into the world of lucid dreaming. Watch it below.

Chigga is joined by his friend and fellow viral star Frank Yang, who for some reason chooses to be pantless, along with another friend of theirs. Because really, why not? They all take a moment away from their bare asses to discuss the finite details of lucid dreaming and the subconscious, an activity that Chigga frequently employs through frequent napping. You have to get inspired some way, right?
Watch Chigga’s most recent music video for “Who That Be” below.

In other music news, Big Sean has dropped a hilariously colorful video for his new single “Moves.” Watch it in all its big-bootied glory right here .
